descriptionHtml:
Shadowmere Replacement Saddle. Dragonsblood Saddle.
Black Dragon Leather trimmed in silver, rubies and dragonsblood.

Both Shadowmere and the Imperial Saddle share the same normal map. So, just leave saddleimperial_n.dds out of the directory unless you want the imperial saddle to look slightly funky. This saddle still looks decent with the default normal mapping.
author: Gary Bertagnolli

files.name: Dragonsblood Saddle v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Both Shadowmere and the Imperial Saddle share the same normal map. So, just leave saddleimperial_n.dds out of the directory unless you want the imperial saddle to look slightly funky. This saddle still looks decent with the default normal mapping.
